Subject: Emails via Outlook getting blocked
Description: Hello, we have users complaining that emails are being blocked by EPP. We do not have Outlook as an exit point. Based on the alert logs it shows the Destination as Microsoft Teams and the Destination Details as outlook.office.com. The user mentioned that they do not use any Outlook add-ons and that they use the Desktop version of Outlook. One of the users stated that they experienced this issue only after switching to a Windows 11 machine, but not sure it is related. I have uploaded logs from one of the user's machine. Could you please investigate and let us know what can be done? Thank you.
What_We_Know__c: The EPP Client was wrongly blocking some uploads on Outlook
Next_Steps__c: A test build was sent to the customer and we are waiting for them to test it.
Account_Name__c: The Stars Group Interactive Services / Flutter International
